page.title: 15PRIMARY EDUCATION CONTINUED
page.content: Unless a new family come to the island the school will shut again in 4 years time as there are no younger children on the island. The classroom is part of the house itself. There are 2 downstairs rooms one of which is the kitchen/living room the other is the classroom.The children have to use the teacher's bathroom for water and toilet facilities. However the school itself has all the facilities that a mainland school has, such as a television and computer. Pupils also have a lot of individual attention.
